user.title: Muslim Assistant Setup
user.description: Location is automatically detected from your Home Assistant settings. Just choose your preferred prayer calculation method.

data_description.name: A name for this Muslim Assistant instance.
data_description.calculation_method: The prayer time calculation method (e.g., ISNA, MWL, Makkah).
data_description.school: Standard (Shafi/Maliki/Hanbali) or Hanafi school for Asr calculation.

audio.title: Audio & Reciter Settings
audio.description: Choose your preferred Quran reciter, Adhan sound, and target speaker for audio playback.

data_description.quran_reciter: Select your preferred Quran reciter for audio playback.
data_description.adhan_sound: Select the Adhan sound you prefer.
data_description.target_media_player: Entity ID of the media player to play audio on (e.g., media_player.living_room_echo).

prayer_adjustments.title: Prayer Time Adjustments
prayer_adjustments.description: Adjust prayer times by adding or subtracting minutes. Range: -30 to +30 minutes.

data_description.fajr_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Fajr time.
data_description.dhuhr_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Dhuhr time.
data_description.asr_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Asr time.
data_description.maghrib_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Maghrib time.
data_description.isha_offset: Minutes to add/subtract from Isha time.
